caption.title: MAYV load on organ and tissues.
caption.p: 15-day old Balb/c mice infected in the rear footpad with 2.57 x 10 6 PFU. At 24, 48, 72, 96, 120 and 144 hpi, liver (A), spleen (B), heart (C), serum (D), right and left ankles E and F), right and left quadricep muscles (G and H) and eyes (I) were harvested and homogenized, and the amount of infectious virus present was quantified by plaque assay on Vero cells. N = 3 animals/group.
